Spoke to Neil Taylor of Fat Badger today. Got 'an offer they couldn't refuse' and sold. Last service at Fat Badger in West End on Sunday.
Just talked to Neil Taylor, of Fat Badger. Had an offer he couldn't refuse & will be closing F.B. Last service this Sunday.
